name: Vipr
body:
### VIPR
For more information download the release and play with it, or go to [this announcement page](http://ben.musicsmiths.us/vipr.phtml).

Download VIPR Max objects using these links

For Mac OS: [https://github.iu.edu/bds6/vipr/releases/download/v1.0/vipr.zip](https://github.iu.edu/bds6/vipr/releases/download/v1.0/vipr.zip)

For Windows (32 bit Max only): [https://github.iu.edu/bds6/vipr/releases/download/v1.0/vipr-win32.zip](https://github.iu.edu/bds6/vipr/releases/download/v1.0/vipr-win32.zip)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
